name: Abigail
quote: Wow, I just realized it's Friday. Sometimes I totally lose track of time.

name: Alex
quote: My Grandma told me I should spend more time studying. Maybe she's right...

name: Elliott
quote: I'm Elliott... I live in the little cabin by the beach. It's a pleasure to meet you.

name: Emily
quote: I have a secret hobby, but I won't say any more. Maybe I'll show you some day.

name: Haley
quote: The only thing I like about this town is the beach.

name: Harvey
quote: It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should.

name: Leah
quote: We wouldn't be able to survive without nature. It's good to remember that.

name: Maru
quote: Some day I'm going to be a world-class inventor. You're lucky to be friends with me!

name: Penny
quote: When you're lost in a book, it's easy to forget the realities of your life.

name: Sam
quote: Last night I practiced guitar for 4 hours straight. My fingers hurt like crazy.

name: Sebastian
quote: People are like stones skipping over the water. Eventually we're going to sink.

name: Shane
quote: I'll definitely be going to the saloon tonight. What else is there to do?
